metadata.Title: CVE-2022-38143 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A heap out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the way OpenImageIOv2.3.19.0 processes RLE encoded BMP images. A specially-crafted bmp filecan write to arbitrary out of bounds memory, which can lead to arbitrarycode execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: openimageio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
